<table><thead><tr><th>

Type Alias


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

[Cmd](./tea.cmd.md)


</td><td>

Command - an async side effect that eventually yields a message. Use `null` to indicate no-op.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[EffectFn](./tea.effectfn.md)


</td><td>

Function producing an effectful message or messages.


</td></tr>

[Msg](./tea.msg.md)


</td><td>

Message - must be discriminated for safe matching.


</td></tr>

</td><td>
